course_description:
Students will gain currency and relevance in the field of applied neuroethics. Class
discussions will supplement assignments which will include a peer commentary of a target article in AJOB Neuroscience and a statement paper that addresses content from  an upper level neuroethics elective.
prerequisites: NBB 380 as co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1578, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: P. Lennard, Status: Open
